name: Rectangle Box Horseshoe Knob
description: This Rectangle Box with a horseshoe knob is a classic piece for everyday usage. Available in other finishes. Currently made to order 5-6 weeks. Handmade. Shagreen/Pen Shell, Bronze-Patina Brass, wood veneer interior. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. Inspired by her parents, her collection of Home Accessories and Furniture has a distinct identity of its own. Kifu uses handmade techniques of elaborate inlay patterns of shagreen, shells, semi-precious stones, interpreted in a younger quirkier way reflecting her youth.
